name: Binal Wordz
description:
Binal Wordz follows the originals rules of Wordz, only that you now have to guess two secret 5-letter words instead just one. 

To begin, type a 5-letter word (or if you wish to cheat any random 5 letters) and then press Enter/Return.  If you make a mistake, you can press backspace before you submit your guess.

After each attempt , the colour of the letter for each word will change in one of three ways:- 

  1. Green - right letter, right position 
  2. Yellow - right letter, different position 
  3. Gray - letter not in that  word.

If after seven attempts, you have not guessed both secret words, they will be revealed to you.
